mission.title: The Goal
mission.text: This project showcases a modern, high-performance web application usage pattern combining Next.js 16 (App Router) with PocketBase for a lightweight yet powerful backend. It provides a clean, responsive interface for reading Hacker News and managing a personal list of favorites.

contact.title: Open Source
contact.text: This project is open source. You can view the code, contribute, or fork it on GitHub.
